channel.title: Comments on: Staff Conversation #6: Google Play Game Services

item.title: By: Steve Taylor
item.dc:creator: Steve Taylor
item.description: Danny, how do you see google play services competing with Corona Cloud? It seems like there is a lot of overlap but I assume Corona sees a value add proposition with the Corona Cloud?
item.content:encoded: Danny, how do you see google play services competing with Corona Cloud? It seems like there is a lot of overlap but I assume Corona sees a value add proposition with the Corona Cloud?
